title: Lemony Cabbage-Avocado Slaw
directions: Toss all ingredients together in a large bowl. Mix until avocado is creamy throughout.
Per serving: 110 calories (60 from fat), 7g total fat, 1g saturated fat, 0mg cholesterol, 115mg sodium, 10g carbohydrates (5g dietary fiber, 3g sugar), 3g protein.
ingredients: 6 cups finely shredded purple and green cabbage
1 small red, orange or yellow pepper, diced
